scripts.deploy:test_goerli: yarn build --network-file ./configs/test.json --network goerli && yarn deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ horse-link/hl-protocol-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:test_arbitrum: yarn build --network-file ./configs/test.json --network arbitrum-one && yarn deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy horse-link/horselink-arbitrum-test
scripts.deploy:dev_goerli: yarn build --network-file ./configs/dev.json --network goerli && yarn deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy horse-link/hl-protocol-dev-goerli
scripts.deploy:dev_arbitrum: yarn build --network-file ./configs/dev.json --network arbitrum-one && yarn deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy horse-link/hl-protocol-dev-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:prod_goerli: yarn build --network-file ./configs/prod.json --network goerli && yarn deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy horse-link/hl-protocol-goerli
scripts.deploy:prod_arbitrum: yarn build --network-file ./configs/prod.json --network arbitrum-one && yarn deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy horse-link/hl-protocol-arbitrum
